titles.title: Expressing the sense of the House of Representatives regarding Earth Day.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health and Environment.

bill.summary: 11/18/1999--Introduced. Expresses the sense of the House of Representatives that Earth Day should be officially established to draw attention to the impact of human activity on the natural environment, alert the world to environmental threats to human health and well-being, and advocate personal actions and public policies to promote and preserve a healthy, diverse, resilient, and productive world for our children.
